name: Notion Travel Manager
description: Have a place for your adventures with Notion TemplateLove traveling? Already dreaming of new adventures?Use this Notion Travel Manager to keep track of all your travels and plan even better new ones.What you’ll get:A space to write down all the destinations. Ones you've been and ones you're dreaming of visitingA space to write down all the placesA space to write down all your tasksWith this Notion Template, you’ll be able to track destinations, places, and tasks for your new adventures.FAQs:1.
